dict.acceptation: 球场；程度；沥青；树脂；倾斜；
用沥青涂；扔，投；树起，搭起；定位于；
抛，扔；[棒球]当投手；搭帐篷；向前跌或冲；

sent.orig: A pitch mesophase can be prepared from petroleum pitch and coal tar pitch.
sent.trans: 从石油沥青和煤沥青中制取沥青中间相物质。

sent.orig: Carbon foams were prepared from coal tar pitch, petroleum mesophase pitch, and AR pitch.
sent.trans: 分别以煤沥青、石油中间相沥青和AR沥青为前驱体制备炭泡沫材料。

sent.orig: The player graphics themselves have also improved have the pitch types and pitch degradation too.
sent.trans: 球员贴图、草皮类型、草皮状况恶化也被改进了。

sent.orig: This study will contribute to the storage of Eureka pitch and exploitation of the pitch resources.
sent.trans: 尤里卡沥青性质的研究对其储存和开发等实际工作有参考价值。

sent.orig: I go around the pitch, I want to see what the pitch and I did that.
sent.trans: 我在草坪边走着，我想知道草坪状况（真是敬业）。
